column4: Hey guys, how should i install the server kernel to see more than 3.2 GB of ram in ubuntu 9.04 32 bit? thanks
Hey guys, how should i install the server kernel to see more than 3.2 GB of ram in ubuntu 9.04 32 bit? thanks
install 64 bit becuase 32 bit limit is 4 gigs of system ram that includes your  graphics card and cache too
